education.institution: Shri Vaishnav Institute of Technology and Science

highlights: Development of Android frontend and Laravel backend for InnerVoice Android App
Analysed ANRs and crashes on Crashlytics on daily basis and worked out on keeping the app stable
Collaborated with team in planning and addition of the InnerVoice Android App
Contributed on one of its open source Android app to fix frontent issues
Collaborated with team members all over the world to fix issues related to appearance and user experience of the app.
Development of graph feature in CDASH app to display number of orders placed on server.
Development of LabelPrint app to enable it to print a product label for shop owners to use.
